QuestData.Title: To Bigger and Better Things
QuestData.Description: There isn't much more glory for you here on the Bulwark, $n. You've done enough already. There may, however, be further adventures waiting in Silverpine Forest.$b$bSpeak with my bat man, Timothy Cunningham. He'll give you a ride to Brill, free of charge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Timothy Cunningham at the Bulwark in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.RewardText: Sure, I'll give you a ride. If High Executor Derrington asks for it, then technically I have to.
